about_the_game:
Thousands Layered Blade: Reforged is an action-packed action RPG game that immerses players in a stunning 3D world inspired by traditional sumi-e art, now enhanced with realistic brush stroke simulations.

Story

Somewhere in the Far East Continent, a country is always in turmoil, where warlords and their hired samurai armies fight for power over the lands. One day, an Imperial Force led by an Emperor rises with a plan to unite them all under one flag. However, the leaders of the samurai, the 4 Kenseis - Sword Saints - foresee that this unification will cause the samurai to lose their way of the sword and their honor. Refusing to join the Imperials, they lead a rebellion against them.

This is where the journey of a young female assassin begins.

Game Features:

  • Unique ink-wash painting (sumi-e) styled 3D graphics, now with simulated brush strokes.

  • Block, parry, and dodge enemy attacks while waiting for the perfect moment to strike back.

  • Mini-games to enjoy between battles.

  • Gain experience by defeating enemies and use it to unlock unique skills and special moves.

  • Unlock different katanas and equipment for each playthrough.
